title: mahAdEvam anisham
sahitya:
mahAdevam anisham manasA smarAmyaham


anupallavi

  mahAsEna pitm mahAmEru nagAsanam mahApApa shamanam shamanArim anantam


caraNam    rAmapriya ravinibha bhAsam kAma tripura damanam trinayanam 
ramaNIya dhavaLAngam umA ramaNam bhavam ranjaka muraLIrava madhu ranjitamajitam
